attributes.action: Elect Paul Manning to the House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a 60 year old employed married male born in the UK with lots of common sense ideas and no particular party affiliations.  I feel it needs more ordinary people like me to represent the middle of the road views of the average working class  Briton and less unrepresentative millionaires, Bishops, Party Faithful and time servers who are there now, Vote for me and prove the system can sometimes work.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
